column3: Ɔsɛnkafo no na ɔse; egyangyandze mu egyangyandze

column2: "Mfaso bɛn na ɔdasanyi nya wɔ ne berɛ a ɔberɛ wɔ wi ase yi mu?"

column3: na ebusuasantsen fofor so ba; naaso asaase dze otsim hɔ daa."

column4: na ɔgye ntsɛm kɔ bea a ofi do pue no do."

column3: na ɔdan dze fa kwaamu afamu; odzi adandan daa wɔ ne nkyekyɛmu mu: na mfar san bio kɔ n'aprɔwbɔmu."
naaso po nnyɛ ma ara da; fakor a esutsen pem kɔ no
column4: hɔ ara so na ɔkɔ bio."

column2: "Abrabɔ nyinara mu wɔ ɔberɛ ma; ɔdasanyi nnkotum ka: enyiwa mmee adzehwɛ
column3: na asowa so nnhyɛ asɛntsie ma."
ɔnoara na ɔbɛba; na dza wɔayɛ noara na wɔbɛyɛ: na adze fofor biara nnyi wi yi ase."

column2: "Ana biribi wɔ hɔ a adasa ka wɔ ho dɛ
column4: iyi dze fofor a? Ɔaba dada ana
column5: wɔ tsetseber a abɛsen kɔ no mu."

column2: "Nkaa bi nnyi hɔ ma ndzɛmba a asen kɔ no; na daakye ndzɛmba ɔbɛba a no so
column3: nnkenya nkaa biara efi dza obesi ekyir aba no hɔ."

column4: midzii Israel do hen wɔ Jerusalɛm."

column2: "Na medze m'akoma nyinara tsiim do dɛ mobɔhwehwɛ na mehu dza wɔyɛ no asaase do nyinara mu: mekyerɛ ɔberɛ edwuma a Nyankopɔn dze ama adasamba dɛ wɔmfa mu no."
"Mehu dwuma a wodzi no wi ase nyinara; na
column4: ne nyinara yɛ egyangyandze nye ɔberɛ gyan."

column3: wonnkotum atsen no: na dza efi mu no

column4: menya nyansa kɛse akyɛn hɔn a wodzii m'enyim nyinara wɔ Jerusalɛm: nyew
column5: m'akoma enya nyansa nye nyimdzee nhunii."

column2: "Na medze m'akoma nyina hwehwɛɛ nyansa na nyimdzee mu
column3: na maahwehwɛ abɔdam nye nkwaseasɛm so mu: na iyi so muhun dɛ ɔyɛ ɔberɛ gyan."

column2: "Na nyansa mbordo mu wɔ awerɛhow dodow: na nyia ɔdɔr nyimdzee no
